thread.section_title: Hitchweb.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hitchweb.com | hitchweb.com
thread.title: James

author: James
title: James
text: I ordered a Curt 5th wheel hitch and install kit, and even though the carrier said it was gonna take a week to get to me, a quick call to Hitchweb's customer service revealed that my order was on its way to me that day...4 days from the order being shipped, to my door (and my address is a remote location as well), all items checked and correct...I will definitely ship Hitchweb again, and refer others to the site :)
